greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. exp(2*x/(1 + x)).
comment: Inverse Lah transform of the powers of 2 (A000079).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..451
formula: a(n) = (-1)^n * n! * Laguerre(n, -1, 2) for n > 0 with a(0) = 1.
mathematica: nmax = 23; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[2 x/(1 + x)], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
nmax = 23; CoefficientList[Series[Product[Exp[-2 (-x)^k], {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
program: (Sage) [1 if n==0 else (-1)^n*factorial(n)*gen_laguerre(n, -1, 2) for n in (0..25)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 23 2021
(Magma) [n eq 0 select 1 else (-1)^n*Factorial(n)*Evaluate(LaguerrePolynomial(n, -1), 2): n in [0..25]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 23 2021
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jul 26 2018
